name: LazzyDoggo
description:
An one time  idle simulator

your scope in the game is to payup your responsibilities and earn enough money to move out of your parents house

Each month you can select a job each job has its default pay+extra royalties as you gain experience

Each month bills are sent to you if you dont pay them interest slowly starts to build up the sooner you finish with them the better

Every two  months you can use each jobs crash  days to gather some extra money be careful as crash days income and duration vary between jobs
